title: Online Vocational Teacher Education: Applied Learning-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental vocational education knowledge and at least one year of field experience
context.additional_context: Implements project-based learning environments integrating theory and practice for current science vocational teachers with vocational education experience

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate the ability to design instruction using an applied learning model in an online environment.
Learners can analyze real-world cases in vocational education and develop three or more strategies for integrating theory and practice.
Learners can improve their instructional design proposals through peer assessment and complete a final project report (approximately 5,000 characters).

resources: Vocational Education Case Database in Science

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
